definition.text: Before you jump into governance, itâ€™s important you know how Superalgos works!

paragraphs.text: We've got a lot of exciting things to talk about, but I want to make sure you can follow along easily.
Make sure you go through the tutorials in the Getting Started Tutorials Plugin Workspace before continuing if you haven't yet!
No need to be an expert, but you will need some general knowledge of the system to understand what this is all about!
